name: api_v1_addresses
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool address_validation_nl.
Tool description: Address Validation NL API returns a valid Dutch address (street name and city/town) for a given postcode and house number
API description: Fetches address information using the provided postcode and house number from the RapidAPI Address Validation API.

housenumber.description: The house number of the address.

housenumbersuffix.description: The suffix of the house number. Defaults to 'B'.
